top_stories.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 Side Events schedule:  Women in Tech, MongoDB, Silkroad Innovation Hub and more to host
top_stories.description: With TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 right around the corner, we’re thrilled to introduce the companies hosting Side Events that will extend the buzz and excitement to the thousands of attendees and Silicon Valley locals alike. Whether it’s a fun happy hour, insightful panels, or energizing morning runs, “Disrupt Week” — happening from October 25-31 — offers […]

top_stories.title: Building smarter AI agents: AgentCore long-term memory deep dive
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory transforms raw conversational data into persistent, actionable knowledge through sophisticated extraction, consolidation, and retrieval mechanisms that mirror human cognitive processes. The system tackles the complex challenge of building AI agents that don't just store conversations but extract meaningful insights, merge related information across time, and maintain coherent memory stores that enable truly context-aware interactions.
top_stories.author: Akarsha Sehwag
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory transforms raw conversational data into persistent, actionable knowledge through sophisticated extraction, consolidation, and retrieval mechanisms that mirror human cognitive processes. top_stories.title: ‘The Next Generation of Compute Is Driving AI,’ Technology Leader Says at NVIDIA AI Day Sydney
top_stories.description: Last week, over 1,000 attendees joined NVIDIA AI Day Sydney to learn about sovereign AI — including 16 breakout sessions on agentic and physical AI, robotics and AI factories.
top_stories.author: Angie Lee
top_stories.content: Last week, over 1,000 attendees joined NVIDIA AI Day Sydney to learn about sovereign AI — including 16 breakout sessions on agentic and physical AI, robotics and AI factories.

top_stories.title: How Starcloud Is Bringing Data Centers to Outer Space
top_stories.description: The NVIDIA Inception startup projects that space-based data centers will offer 10x lower energy costs and reduce the need for energy consumption on Earth.
top_stories.author: Angie Lee
top_stories.content: The NVIDIA Inception startup projects that space-based data centers will offer 10x lower energy costs and reduce the need for energy consumption on Earth.

top_stories.title: Huawei Wins Three Awards in All-Optical Networks at Network X 2025
top_stories.description: At the Network X 2025 ceremony, Huawei won three awards: Most Innovative Optical Transport Use Case, Best Network AI Solution for Fibre Networks, and Outstanding Green Fibre. These honors reflect Huawei’s strong technology, continuous innovation, and market leadership in all-optical networks. Huawei continues to lead the way in optical transmission,... The post Huawei Wins Three Awards in All-Optical Networks at Network X 2025 first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
